text: Arthur Rodrigues Rezende (born 21 March 1994), simply known as Arthur Rezende, is a Brazilian footballer who plays for Guarani, on loan from Boavista, as a midfielder. ==Club career== Born in São Francisco do Sul, Santa Catarina, Arthur finished his formation with Goiás. In 2015, he was promoted to the main squad, making his senior debuts in the year's Campeonato Goiano. Arthur made his Série A debut on 24 May, starting in a 1–0 away win against Palmeiras.Em Arena lotada, Goiás surpreende e bate Palmeiras, que segue sem vencer (In a full Arena, Goiás surprises and defeats Palmeiras, who remains winless); Globo Esporte, 24 May 2015 ==References== ==External links== *Ogol profile * Category:1994 births Category:People from Santa Catarina (state) Category:Living people Category:Brazilian footballers Category:Association football midfielders Category:Campeonato Brasileiro Série A players Category:LigaPro players Category:Cypriot First Division players Category:Goiás Esporte Clube players Category:Gil Vicente F.C. players Category:AEL Limassol players Category:Santa Cruz Futebol Clube players Category:Boavista Sport Club players Category:Guarani FC players Category:Brazilian expatriate footballers Category:Expatriate footballers in Portugal Category:Expatriate footballers in Cyprus
title: Arthur Rodrigues Rezende
